description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Lorient vs Pau in the Ligue 2
title: Lorient vs Pau: Ligue 2 stats & head-to-head
title_page: Lorient vs Pau: Ligue 2 stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Goal!
Goal! Lorient 5, Pau 0. Aiyegun Tosin (Lorient) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the top right corner. Assisted by Bandiougou Fadiga with a cross.
Post
Attempt missed. Antoine Mille (Pau) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left.
Post
Penalty conceded by Igor Silva (Lorient) after a foul in the penalty area.
Post
Fourth official has announced 6 minutes of added time.
Post
Attempt missed. Tom Gomes (Pau) right footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the left following a set piece situation.
Post
Attempt missed. Isaac James (Lorient) left footed shot from the left side of the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Igor Silva with a cross.
